title: Python Programming Language

lessons.title: Introduction to Python
lessons.summary: Basic introduction to Python programming language and its uses.

lessons.title: Functions in Python
lessons.summary: In-depth explanation of functions, arguments, and scope in Python.

lessons.title: Working with Arrays
lessons.summary: An overview of arrays and how to manipulate data structures in Python.

assessment: Quiz and coding exercises after each module.
requirements: A laptop or desktop with internet access
materials: Course notes and reference documents provided

title: JavaScript Essentials

lessons.title: Introduction to JavaScript
lessons.summary: Understanding the basics of JavaScript and how it works.

lessons.title: JavaScript Functions
lessons.summary: Understanding functions, callbacks, and closures in JavaScript.

lessons.title: Manipulating the DOM
lessons.summary: Learn how to manipulate web page content using JavaScript.

requirements: A basic understanding of HTML and CSS

title: Advanced React.js

lessons.title: React Hooks
lessons.summary: Introduction to React hooks like useState, useEffect, and custom hooks.

lessons.title: Managing State with Redux
lessons.summary: Deep dive into managing state in large applications using Redux.

lessons.title: Optimizing Performance in React
lessons.summary: Techniques for improving the performance of React applications.

assessment: Final project: Build a complex React app.

title: Node.js Backend Development

lessons.title: Introduction to Node.js
lessons.summary: Overview of Node.js and building your first server.

lessons.title: Working with Express.js
lessons.summary: Understanding how to build APIs using Express.js.

lessons.title: Database Integration with MongoDB
lessons.summary: Learn how to connect Node.js apps to MongoDB for data storage.

assessment: Build a backend API as the final project.
materials: Postman or another API testing tool

title: Full Stack Web Development

lessons.title: Introduction to Web Development
lessons.summary: Overview of front-end and back-end web development concepts.

lessons.title: Building with HTML & CSS
lessons.summary: Learn how to structure web pages using HTML and style them with CSS.

lessons.title: JavaScript for Interactivity
lessons.summary: Using JavaScript to add interactivity and functionality to web pages.

assessment: Create a full-stack web application as the final project.
materials: Git and GitHub for version control

title: Machine Learning with Python

lessons.title: Introduction to Machine Learning
lessons.summary: Overview of machine learning concepts and applications.

lessons.title: Supervised Learning Algorithms
lessons.summary: Learn about supervised learning techniques such as regression and classification.

lessons.title: Unsupervised Learning Algorithms
lessons.summary: Explore clustering, dimensionality reduction, and other unsupervised learning techniques.

assessment: Complete a project using a real-world dataset and present your findings.
requirements: Understanding of linear algebra and statistics

title: iOS App Development with Swift

lessons.title: Introduction to Swift Programming
lessons.summary: An introduction to Swift programming language and basic syntax.

lessons.title: Building UI with SwiftUI
lessons.summary: Learn how to create responsive and interactive UIs using SwiftUI.

lessons.title: Networking and APIs
lessons.summary: How to connect your app to external APIs and fetch data.

assessment: Build a complete iOS app and submit it as a final project.

title: Data Structures and Algorithms

lessons.title: Introduction to Data Structures
lessons.summary: Understanding basic data structures such as arrays, linked lists, and stacks.

lessons.title: Sorting Algorithms
lessons.summary: Learn various sorting algorithms such as quicksort and mergesort.

lessons.title: Graph Algorithms
lessons.summary: Explore algorithms for graph traversal and shortest path finding.

assessment: Solve multiple algorithmic problems and optimize your solutions.
requirements: Understanding of time complexity and Big O notation
materials: Text editor or IDE of your choice

title: DevOps Fundamentals

lessons.title: Introduction to DevOps
lessons.summary: Learn what DevOps is and why it is important in modern software development.

lessons.title: CI/CD Pipelines
lessons.summary: How to automate the build, test, and deployment processes.

lessons.title: Infrastructure as Code
lessons.summary: Managing and provisioning infrastructure using code with tools like Terraform.

assessment: Build a CI/CD pipeline for a sample application.
materials: Docker and Terraform installed on your system

title: Blockchain Development

lessons.title: Introduction to Blockchain
lessons.summary: Understanding the basics of blockchain technology and its applications.

lessons.title: Smart Contracts with Solidity
lessons.summary: Learn how to create smart contracts on Ethereum using Solidity.

lessons.title: Building Decentralized Applications (DApps)
lessons.summary: Develop and deploy DApps on Ethereum using Web3.js.

assessment: Create and deploy your own decentralized application on a test network.
materials: Truffle and Ganache installed for local development
